title: Negating Predicate Functions in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of negating a predicate function in JavaScript. We will learn how to create a higher-order function that takes a predicate function and returns a new function that negates the original function's output. Through practical examples, we will see how this technique can be useful in filtering arrays or validating input.

meta.title: Mastering Predicate Function Negation in JavaScript
meta.description: Explore the art of negating predicate functions in JavaScript, unlock powerful filtering and validation techniques.
meta.keywords: negation, javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, validation, javascript lab, filtering, javascript tutor, predicate function

verify.name: Verify Node Usage In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
